archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Business Continuity business environment scope assessment process
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
This process determines the individual business environments to be supported by business continuity plans and arrangements by identifying and recording relevant details (e.g. in a business continuity risk register).
One of the requirements for this process is also to ensure business continuity programme is applied accross the organziation to all environmetns which are in business continuity risk register
